quotes: Three years passed quickly and then there was another decision to be taken.

organizations.name: Presidency College
quotes: That openness to people quite naturally extended to my own cohort in the very congenial environment of Presidency College.

organizations.name: Delhi School of Economics
quotes: Delhi School of Economics was known as the best place to study economics in India and my father, in his gentle and always carefully balanced way, was nudging me to go there.

organizations.name: Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU)
quotes: The alternative was Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) in New Delhi, famous for its lively political life and Marxist economics.
The alternative was Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) in New Delhi, famous for its lively political life and Marxist economics.
